description:
The Warrior of the Snake, younger of the Tatsumi Brothers, is a dangerous individual who would have become a pyromaniac if he hadn`t become a warrior. On their way to the Juni Taisen, he remembers the day his brother saved his life, just after learning that only one of them would survive the ordeal. Then, as they arrive at the starting venue, the warrior Usagi approaches them, asking them to become his friends...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In Like a Dragon, Out Like a Snake (Part 1)
Tête de dragon, queue de serpent (Premier attaquant)
